abstract: On second thought, it appears the joke may be on us. Greg Newton’s ability to open the window of his Gulfstream V jet should have given us pause. We tip our hats to Mr. Newton.
lead_paragraph: On second thought, it appears the joke may be on us. Greg Newton’s ability to open the window of his Gulfstream V jet should have given us pause. We tip our hats to Mr. Newton.

headline.main: Trade and a Haircut: Brian Hunter’s New Digs
